p.dialogue: "Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alex.#$e#I'll see you around."
"Finally, we're here!"
"Aw... I guess it can't last forever.$s"
"I knew I shoulda brought a frisbee... Oh well.$h"
"I wonder if anyone would be up for a volleyball tournament.#$e#Don't worry, I'll go easy!$h"
"I wonder how far I could swim out, and still make it back?#$e#I'm guessing at least a mile.#$b#... Don't worry, I'm not going to try it.$h"
"Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, man... It's the beach!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!"
"With this island open, there's no excuse to be pasty anymore!"
"Phew, it feels good to finally get these abs a little sunlight.#$e#Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home."
"When I go pro, I'll vacation on islands all around the world.#$e#But for now, this place will do just fine!$h"
"I'm ordering a banana shake with two scoops of protein powder."
"Ah... The island life. I could get used to this!"
"Nah... I'm gonna ask someone else. Good luck."
"I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s"
"You're not worth my time.$a"
"I don't know if I can trust you anymore, but I'm willing to give you a chance.$9"
"You're giving me wha...?$7#$b#*huff*... Got it. Alright... well, you've made your choice. You're not gonna see me begging.$a"
"Did you know I was an all-star quarterback in high school? It's true.$u#$e#See this little star on my jacket here? That proves it."

"The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#*sigh*... I wish there were more girls in this town, know what I mean?$s^Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a bikini?"

"Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.^If you weren't a girl I'd ask you to play catch.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?"
"#$p 5#Go long! ...just kidding. Hahaha.|I just wish I had someone to play catch with...$s"
"Really? I guess I underestimated you.#$b#My arm's a little sore, but maybe next time."
"Yeah, some people just aren't made for sports."
"Uh... nevermind."
"The air's starting to warm up... I'm feeling pumped."

"Hey, what's up farmer guy?^Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?"
"My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a guy like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday."
"Hey.#$e#What, you wanna talk to me? I'm busy."
"Hey, @.#$e#That's right, I remember your name."
"Hey, @.#$e#How's your day going?"
"Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h"
"Nothing's better than an energetic day at the beach with your friends... right?"

"You know, I used to want fame and fortune, but lately I've been starting to sing a different tune. In the end it's the humble little things that satisfy, don't you think?#$e#I still want to go pro, but it's not the most important thing in the world."
"Hi @. You look sporty today.$h^Hey @. Did you do something different with your hair? Something keeps grabbing my attention.$h"
"I've been having a hard time staying focused lately.$l"
"Of course you do. If you didn't I'd think you were crazy. Or some kind of nerd."
"Really? You must be some kind of weirdo.$a#$b#Sorry."
"No, I'm not! You're just trying to flatter me.$a"
"Yeah, I guess you're right...$s"
"You were supposed to disagree with me.$a"
"Yes... I know. That's why I've been so determined to be successful with my sports stuff...$9#$b#Make it or not... As long as I try my hardest I think she'd be proud. Thanks."
"Wow... It's the anniversary of my Mom's death! Have a heart...$a"
"...Thanks, @.#$b#You... you're different than the other guys. More sensitive.$l^You've become my best friend in the whole town... #$b#I'm glad.^Is that embarrassing to say?$l"
"That doesn't make me feel any better, jerk.$a"
"That's an interesting thought..."
"They would never do that!$a"
"...Maybe you're right... I dunno.$s"
"Hey. Summer is definitely the best time of year.#$e#Right now is great because we've got the whole season to look forward to. Catch you later."

"Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.^Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?"
"If my hair wasn't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough."

"Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman"
"$p 52#Hey, when I turn pro you can say you were my first \"fan\". Not bad, huh?|Hey, I've been practicing twice as hard so I can turn pro and prove you wrong. You just wait.$a"
"Hey, now that's what I'm talking about!$h#$e#You're cooler than I thought."
"Yeah, well I'm so good I'm not going to have to practice all that much.$u"

"That's insane. You're just jealous that I'm talented and popular and you're not.$a^That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm way more popular than you'll ever be, freak.$a#$e#Get away from me.$a"

"Hey, you must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day.^Hey, you must be getting pretty fit working on that farm all day.#$e#Maybe you'll reach my level some day. Something to look forward to, huh?#$e#Why do you have that look on your face?"
"What do you want?#$e#I've got more important things to do right now."
"Mmmm... I smell a barbeque.#$e#Damn I could go for a burger."

"I got these new shoes yesterday 'cuz my old pair had a brown smudge.#$b#I just threw them into the garbage. I would've donated them but I don't like the idea of some weirdo wearing my shoes, ya know?#$e#...What?$a"
"Oh wow...your shoes are a little dirty... but that's fine, too!#$e#Different people have different tastes I guess."
"Hey, you look like you're getting into some good shape this summer!#$b#All that farm work is paying off, huh?"
"Hey, nice tan."
"Sorry my room is so messy.$s#$e#It's just hard to always remember to clean. I'm trying to get better, though."
"You know, I actually wouldn't mind being a farmer... it seems a lot like playing sports, in a way.#$e#I like being outdoors and doing things with my hands."
"I've been trying to do more reading lately... I feel like I've been neglecting my brain for years because of my athletic obsession."
"Sure, it's getting colder... But it's still warm enough for sports!#$e#That's all I care about."
"My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I was like, '...Grams, don't fret. I'm turning pro!'$h#$e#Studying is for nerds, anyway."

"Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Do you think the ladies like my haircut?^What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth."
"I put too much gel in my hair today. It kind of hurts.#$e#Don't touch it!#$e#...what?"
"Yeah, I know. That's why I have it like this."
"Yeah right. You're just jealous that I look so good."
"What's up?#$e#Isn't your name, like, %firstnameletter%name, or something?#$e#Oh. It's @? Okay. Sorry."
"I'm going to do two hundred sit-ups tonight.#$b#I'm pretty dedicated, aren't I?$h#$e#Need anything else?"
"I think you can find salmon in the river this time of year.#$e#At least that's what I heard."
"Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#Sundays are pretty awesome in the fall.$u"
"What's up, @?"
"I'm going to do a ton of sit-ups tonight.#$e#You have to work really hard if you want to achieve your maximum potential."
"My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#Maybe she's right...$s"
"I finally took the plunge... I've decided to stop putting gel in my hair.#$e#I wouldn't want to be friends with someone who only liked me because I have gel in my hair."
"Winter is kind of lame. There's too much snow to do anything fun.#$e#I guess some people like it."
"You like the snow? Me... I'm just looking forward to spring."
"Hey, can you go find Haley and tell her I said 'hi'?"
"Oh, hey. How's the married life coming along?$9"
"People stay indoors a lot during the winter, and do boring stuff.$s#$e#Maybe if I read a book I'd be less bored... nah."
"When I turn pro, I'll be so rich that I'll get a vacation home in the tropics.#$e#Then I won't have to deal with these boring winters."
"You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#I guess that makes sense."
"There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it."
"Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#This might be my favorite day of the week."
"You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#That's nice of you.$h"
"I guess it's interesting that some people are totally different than us, you know?#$b#I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine."
"Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks."
"I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9"
"You know what? I'm going to start reading a book!"
"I wish I could control the weather."
"If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.#$e#That means you, too.$h"
